name: Sean Zubrickas
text: Service was excellent. Food was exactly what we hoped for. Staff was friendly and let us eat inside even though they were closing up shortly. Highly recommend!

name: Andrea Bowmar
text: Ordered at 6:24 pm. Was sent a text shortly after that order was on the way. Now it‚Äôs 9:23. No order. Called three times. Got the run around. They actually cancelled my order at 835. I did not tell them to do that. Rude and obviously lazy. Orders from Villa Nova instead.

name: Shannon Marie
text: This location is awesome, unlike 2 other kiosk locations in neighboring county.  Fresh, hot, appetizing pizza. Wait staff goes above and beyond to make sure you are well taken care of.

name: Jamie B.
text: It's pizza hut. Hard to really screw up pizza, can usually get a pie in about 15 min. Worth downloading the app as you can normally get $7 large pizza deals.

name: Craig Johnson
text: My wife was not happy that the cashier started making her pizza after she had just taken her money. The manager made her another pizza. Other than that great customer service and good pizza.

name: Sam Peters
text: Ordered pizza and waited two hours so we finally called them. They told us 30 minutes and we‚Äôd have our stuff. Ended up being 3 hours and they told us the order was canceled. Had to just get villa nova. Save yourself the headache this place is trash.

name: Leonard Paxton
text: I haven't had PH in a good while. And since then,their personal pan is THREE INCHES SMALLER!! I know I used to work at PH!! But the mgr. And staff we're tops!! Can't blame them that corporate..SUCKS!!!

name: David Martin
text: I like Pizza Hut pizza better than anywhere else. People rave about this place or that place. There is good pizza around, but nothing beats a Pizza Hut pizza, especially the personal pan pizza with black olives, green olives, ground beef, ‚Ä¶More

name: Dustan Meadows
text: Horrible!!!! I use to love them!! I ordered a pizza special, Pizza and breadsticks, cookie. Delivered no cookie or breadstick. Driver says ohh sorry, I will have them credit you. Loaded pepperoni is what they brought me! I choked it down. ‚Ä¶More

name: Leah Cline
text: We had delivery to our hotel and it was fabulous!! We got the food in 30 minutes tops, the delivery man was very courteous, it is delicious, and they thought to bring us plates!!

name: Andrew Craw
text: We called ahead and ordered our food and when we got there we decided to eat in instead. They were so great and the waitress was awesome!!

name: Cat Thomas
text: Seated right away however it took a few mintues to get our appetizer (wings) and then 5 minutes or so after asked for cutlery. When she returned to the table, she apologized for the wait saying that they were required to fold them fancy. Food was good and we devoured our pizza. Just an okay day for service I suppose.

name: Steve
text: These folks did an awesome job. My waitress, Elizabeth, was bright and cheery, and did a wonderful job. The pizza was perfect, and came quickly. The dining room and bathrooms were clean. Nice job, great staff.

name: Alex S
text: Sub-par pizza at best, but pizza is still pizza am I right?! It is always fun coming in because it seems like someone new is always working.

name: Angela Borgne
text: Friendly waitress, clean dining area. Improperly cooked (eatable, but not proper) pie, at a much higher expense than were we're from & beverage even worse. Menu was not price marked. No buffet at lunch/dinner. No WiFi. Location was not busy at time of visit.

name: Kaci Halsel
text: Ordered delivery online and only half my order showed up then when I called the lovely female on the phone laughed that I was upset and kindly offered to remake my order and send it back out as if it was a favor!!! Ordered regurally for a year and the last few times nothing but mistakes.

name: Rufino Gayton
text: Happy people clean restaurant

name: Kevin Vinciguerra
text: BEST PIZZA HUT EVER!!!!!  Was up in our lake house for the weekend in New Buffalo with family.  Everybody got hungry and we all wanted Pizza.  Called a few places and was going to be an hour.  Called Pizza Hut, said 15 minutes I was SOLD! ‚Ä¶More

name: Karen Sartler
text: The waitress was super nice and friendly. They were busy with take-out, but our food came quick and it was very good. We don't normally go to Pizza hut, but compared to some other selections around that area, they had good ratings and no ‚Ä¶More

name: Diana Lingenfelter
text: Dont ever go 2 hours prior to closing you will get treated like horriblely. Food will be cold. Then they get upset because you ask for a box to take your pizza home. Well you are treating us like crap.This was a saturday to.

name: Tallon 2k
text: Pizza was great and the counter person was friendly.

name: Bill Breen
text: Great food. Great service. Would recommend to everyone. And they really GD specials most of the time. Dine in or carry out, and they delivery

name: camp nut
text: Double check your order, they seem to short us sauces every time.

name: George Stein
text: Very friendly staff and the pizza was sensational. My son loves the rubber duck crane machine in the back!

name: Ben Espinosa
text: Friendly service. Good food. Clean establishment

name: Levi Shipley
text: Not to bad, the wait wasnt thst long and the people weren't to bad, pretty average experience, neither good nor Bad, the food was nice and hot and the drinks were nice and cold

name: James Nardin
text: There pizza is always fresh

name: Casey Rumsey
text: Always good pizza always have specials

name: Heather Munro
text: On 9-4-17 my faimly and I stopped here on way home (South Haven, mi) from Indiana. Staff was VERY FRIENDLY. Waitress was amazing great customer service... Keep up the great work

name: Ryan Vinson
text: Debbie was super kind and sweet always asking us if we were okay and needed anything, she was by far my favorite waitress I ever had.

name: Howard Phillips
text: Good food, friendly service

name: Michael Grafford
text: Always good from this pizza hut

name: Wendy Pratt
text: This one is so much better than most locations.

name: Kay Espinosa
text: Good service, good food.

name: Darcy Bish
text: C.J. is awesome she knows her customer service and how to make an awesome üçï pizza!

name: Jared W.
text: Great pizza, great and clean environment. Staff was very friendly.

name: Vickie White
text: Restaurant always clean and neat girls nice and friendly.....

name: Bob Juday
text: Good food at fair price

name: Larry Gust
text: Decent food, Service was ok, it does the job if you want pizza.

name: Michele Bales
text: Good pizza and such a clean restaurant.

name: Marcia Pease
text: Always nice and friendly atmosphere when we eat in. They are also nice about doing a carry-out transaction so I don't have to lug my Walker out especially when my joints are bothering me and more painful.

name: Alfred Wallard
text: It was good

name: Tony Fields
text: usually good here

name: Terry Borolov
text: Good food ok service

name: Mary Fuller
text: Great veggie thin crust. Yum

name: Underdog Uprising
text: Hey dat's pretty good

name: Janis Steury
text: Pizza not great, But edible. Service tried but was only 2 people working.

name: Jennifer Mann
text: Great service

name: VaBre JuRo
text: Needs to add vegan food

name: Lori Miller
text: The staff is great!

name: Ashlee Myers
text: delicious hott and fresh

name: Kimberly Krueger
text: Great place

name: JMNIIJLN
text: It's a Pizza Hut. You get what you expect. I gave it an extra star as it was clean and the staff was friendly.

name: Robert Long III
text: They do OK for a pizza Hut

name: Pawel Trznadel
text: Amazing service :)

name: Andry Gonzalez
text:
(Translated by Google) Very good pizza, recommended
